Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Oceancrest Avenue, south of a Paladin's Order.
Room.LongDescription: The Holy Order of the Black Cross is located on the north side of the road, opposite the Holy Order of Corellon Larethian on the south side of the street. Luckily, there is not much hostility between humans and elves so they can practice their own religions and beliefs without annoying the other race.
